DisplayedItem.name: DI_50775
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_50775_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_23040
DisplayedItem.title: The phrases in *asterisks* include clinical findings required for AJCC staging. This clinical information may not be available to the pathologist. However, if known, these findings should be incorporated into the pathologic staging.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_58907
DisplayedItem.title: For the Supraglottis

ListItem.name: LI_23083
ListItem.title: pT1: Tumor limited to one subsite of supraglottis *with normal vocal cord mobility*

ListItem.name: LI_23084
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor invades mucosa of more than one adjacent subsite of supraglottis or glottis or region outside the supraglottis (e.g., mucosa of base of tongue, vallecula, medial wall of pyriform sinus) *without fixation of the larynx*

ListItem.name: LI_23085
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor limited to larynx *with vocal cord fixation* and / or invades any of the following: postcricoid area, preepiglottic space, paraglottic space, and / or inner cortex of thyroid cartilage

DisplayedItem.name: DI_30102
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced

ListItem.name: LI_23086
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor invades through the thyroid cartilage and / or invades tissues beyond the larynx (e.g., trachea, soft tissues of neck including deep extrinsic muscle of tongue, strap muscles, thyroid, or esophagus)

ListItem.name: LI_23087
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades prevertebral space, encases carotid artery, or invades mediastinal structures

DisplayedItem.name: DI_48814
DisplayedItem.title: For the Glottis

DisplayedItem.name: DI_58118
DisplayedItem.title: pT1: Tumor limited to the vocal cords (may involve anterior or posterior commissure) *with normal mobility*

ListItem.name: LI_23093
ListItem.title: pT1a: Tumor limited to one vocal cord

ListItem.name: LI_23094
ListItem.title: pT1b: Tumor involves both vocal cords

ListItem.name: LI_23095
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor extends to supraglottis and / or subglottis, *and / or with impaired vocal cord mobility*

ListItem.name: LI_23096
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor limited to the larynx *with vocal cord fixation* and / or invasion of paraglottic space and / or inner cortex of the thyroid cartilage

DisplayedItem.name: DI_40176
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced

ListItem.name: LI_23097
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor invades through the outer cortex of the thyroid cartilage and / or invades tissues beyond the larynx (e.g., trachea, cricoid cartilage, soft tissues of neck including deep extrinsic muscle of the tongue, strap muscles, thyroid, or esophagus)

ListItem.name: LI_23098
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades prevertebral space, encases carotid artery, or invades mediastinal structures

DisplayedItem.name: DI_59929
DisplayedItem.title: For the Subglottis

ListItem.name: LI_23104
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor extends to vocal cord(s) *with normal or impaired mobility*

ListItem.name: LI_40968
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor limited to larynx *with vocal cord fixation* and / or invasion of paraglottic space and / or inner cortex of the thyroid cartilage

DisplayedItem.name: DI_52124
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced

ListItem.name: LI_23106
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor invades cricoid or thyroid cartilage and / or invades tissues beyond the larynx (e.g., trachea, soft tissues of neck including deep extrinsic muscles of the tongue, strap muscles, thyroid, or esophagus)

ListItem.name: LI_23107
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades prevertebral space, encases carotid artery, or invades mediastinal structures

ListItem.name: LI_866567
ListItem.title: (m) multiple primary synchronous tumors in a single organ

DisplayedItem.name: DI_24380
DisplayedItem.title: # Midline nodes are considered ipsilateral nodes.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_41343
DisplayedItem.title: Pathological ENE should be recorded as ENE(−) or ENE(+).

DisplayedItem.name: DI_39551
DisplayedItem.title: Measurement of the metastatic focus in the lymph nodes is based on the largest metastatic deposit size, which may include matted or fused lymph nodes.

ListItem.name: LI_327854
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327855
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_23128
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_53680
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral lymph node, 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_45801
DisplayedItem.title: pN2: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral lymph node, 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or larger than 3 cm but not larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or metastases in multiple ipsilateral lymph nodes, none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or in bilateral or contralateral lymph node(s), none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_58117
ListItem.title: pN2a: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral node, 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or in a single ipsilateral node, larger than 3 cm but not larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_52555
ListItem.title: pN2b: Metastases in multiple ipsilateral nodes, none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_55953
ListItem.title: pN2c: Metastases in bilateral or contralateral lymph node(s), none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_43611
DisplayedItem.title: pN3: Metastasis in a lymph node, larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or metastasis in a single ipsilateral node, larger than 3 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or multiple ipsilateral, contralateral, or bilateral lymph nodes any with ENE(+); or a single contralateral node of any size and ENE(+)

ListItem.name: LI_56551
ListItem.title: pN3a: Metastasis in a lymph node, larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_51906
ListItem.title: pN3b: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral node, larger than 3 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or multiple ipsilateral, contralateral, or bilateral lymph nodes any with ENE(+); or a single contralateral node of any size and ENE(+)

ListItem.name: LI_24388
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_24388_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

ListItem.name: LI_54556
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumors limited to the mucosa and immediately underlying soft tissue, regardless of thickness or greatest dimension; for example, polypoid nasal disease, pigmented or nonpigmented lesions of the oral cavity, pharynx, or larynx

DisplayedItem.name: DI_53521
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced disease

ListItem.name: LI_24378
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor involving deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone, or overlying skin

ListItem.name: LI_24377
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor involving brain, dura, skull base, lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII), masticator space, carotid artery, prevertebral space, or mediastinal structures

ListItem.name: LI_866570
ListItem.title: (m) multiple primary synchronous tumors in a single organ

ListItem.name: LI_327857
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327858
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_24392
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_24393
ListItem.title: pN1: Regional lymph node metastases present

ListItem.name: LI_24396
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_24396_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_43441
DisplayedItem.title: For reporting molecular testing and other cancer biomarker testing results, the CAP Head and Neck Biomarker Template should be used. Pending biomarker studies should be listed in the Comments section of this report.
